info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 02 at 3:57PM PDT until September 02 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northeastern Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 800 PM PDT. * At 357 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across northeastern Clark County. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Mesquite, Overton, Moapa Town, Moapa Valley, Overton Beach, Valley Of Fire, Logandale, Echo Bay, Echo Bay Campground and Bunkerville. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
